page.title: 07RIDDLESWORTH HALL SCHOOL
page.content: Riddlesworth Hall is a preparatory school for 135 boarding girls aged 7-12 years. It has been a school for 39 years; previously it was a home. The school prepares girls for the common entrance examination to senior schools in English, maths, French, history, geography, science, physical education, music and art and craft. Recently additions are new classrooms and an indoor heated swimming pool. The present headmistress says that prospective parents notice the beautiful grounds and buildings and the happy children. Hobbies include choir, horse riding, fishing, shooting, swimming, athletics, hockey, lace making and computing clubs. The girls can learn to play the piano, flute, guitar, horn clarinet,violin and recorder. Many local people are employed here.
